video_prompt: Character's gentle expression subtly shifts. Hair gently sways and moves with an unseen breeze. Garment ruffles subtly animate. Out-of-focus background elements softly blur and reform.
image_prompt: Anime woman with long white hair, light brown eyes, soft gentle expression, looking at viewer. Dark blue/black jacket over white collared shirt, black bow tie, shimmering dark blue/purple brooch with gold frame. Black top with ruffled trim, subtle cleavage. Gold leaf earrings with dark gems. Subtle nose and chin highlights. Dark, slightly out-of-focus background and foreground elements. Digital anime art style.
refined_video_prompt: A character's gentle expression slowly transforms. Hair subtly drifts and resettles, stirred by an invisible current. Fabric softly ripples and folds, animating the garment. Out-of-focus background elements continuously shift focus, gently blurring and sharpening.
